name: GeoDoggy Mapping System
short_description:
GeoDoggy (Perl CGI) is a web-based interface and national map dataset that enables users to render maps of specific portions of the US, DC, and US territories.
The data is derived from the US Bureau of the Census Public Domain Tiger Line (TM) dataset. S
